item.title: Effective Programming Practice: Final Project
item.description: Project Description References Documentation Potentially Useful R Packages Notes on Minimal Distance Estimation Notes on AGS (2017) Multivation Model Sample Sensitivity Estimation Example: OLS Generalisation: Classical Minimal Distance (CMD) Instrumental Variable Application on Gourinchas & Parker (2002) Project Description Sensitivity Measures for Method of Simulated Moments: diagnostic tools for moments based estimation. Your task is to implement those tools in Python and to integrate them in estimagic.

item.title: Notes on Effective Programming Practice
item.description: Slides Example Process of A Project Clone from Remote Create from Local Create from cookiecutter Runtime: Building Runtime: Testing Shell Reference Basics Pipeline TeX Git Reference Basics Escape Vim Late .gitignore Multiple Branches Tagging Collaboration (Ana)Conda Reference Setup for Zsh Create & Delete Environment Kernels Use Sublime with SendCode Python Waf Reference Config Build Miscellaneous Regular Expression Note: I use macOS Catalina with Zsh (Oh-My-Zsh) and Sublime Text 3.

item.title: Notes on Python 3
item.description: Reference Personal Notes continue, pass & break if __name__ == "__main__" Python on DataCamp Basics Boolean & Comparison Functions Condition & Control Flows Methods Dictionary Tuple Writing Functions Lambda Functions Error Handeling Using Packages Package: Numpy on DataCamp Basics Comparison Methods Control Flows Package: Pandas on DataCamp Create DataFrame Import & Export DataFrame Access DataFrame DataFrame & Series Filter DataFrame Manipulate DataFrame Control Flows Package: Matplotlib on DataCamp Line & Scatter Plot Histogram Plotting Options Package: Seaborn on DataCamp Scatter Plot Relational Plot (Facet Panel) Plotting Options Line Plot Notes from Effective Programming Simple Examples Containers Converting Between Types Alias List & Loop Dictionary Conditions Function Module Numpy Test (Manually) Test: pytest Reference PEP 8 -- Style Guide for Python Code | Python.
